mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.create_date, p.update_date, p.view_count, u.user_id, u.nickname from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.user_id;
select p.post_id, p.title, p.content, p.create_date, p.update_date, p.view_count, u.user_id, u.nickname from post p left join user u on p.user_id = u.user_id where post_id = #{postId};
mapper.insert: insert into post (post_id, title, content, create_date, user_id) values (#{postId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{userId})
